verses.verse: And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up, and <S%G3985>testing<s%> Him <S%G1905>asked<s%> Him to <S%G1925>show<s%> them a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "When it is <S%G3798>evening,<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> '[It will be] <S%G2105>fair<s%> <S%G2105>weather,<s%> for the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red.<s%>'

"And in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> ['There will be] a <S%G5494>storm<s%> <S%G4594>today,<s%> for the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red<s%> and <S%G4768>threatening.<s%>' Do you <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G1097>how<s%> to <S%G1252>discern<s%> the <S%G4383>appearance<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> but <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> [discern] the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of the <S%G2540>times<s%>?

"An <S%G4190>evil<s%> and <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G1934>seeks<s%> <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign;<s%> and a <S%G4592>sign<s%> will not be <S%G1325>given<s%> it, <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonah.<s%>" And He <S%G2641>left<s%> them, and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away.<s%>
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> and had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3708>"Watch<s%> out and <S%G4337>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>"
And they began to <S%G1260>discuss<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "[It is] <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1097>aware<s%> of this, <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You <S%G3640>men<s%> of <S%G3640>little<s%> <S%G3640>faith,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G1260>discuss<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>?

"Do you not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> of the <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand,<s%> and <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> you <S%G2983>took<s%> up?

<S%G3761>"Or<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> of the <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand,<s%> and <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4711>large<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> you <S%G2983>took<s%> up?

<S%G4459>"How<s%> is it that you do not <S%G3539>understand<s%> that I did not <S%G3004>speak<s%> to you <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>? But <S%G4337>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> they <S%G4920>understood<s%> that He did not <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G4337>beware<s%> of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G740>bread,<s%> but of the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> into the <S%G3313>district<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5376>Philippi,<s%> He [began] <S%G2065>asking<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> do <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is?"

And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3588>"Some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> [say] <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> and <S%G243>others,<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah;<s%> but still <S%G2087>others,<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>"
He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "But <S%G5101>who<s%> do you <S%G3004>say<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%>?"

And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Thou <S%G1510>art<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> are you, <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G920>Barjona,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood<s%> did not <S%G601>reveal<s%> [this] to you, but My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

"And I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that you are <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and upon <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4073>rock<s%> I will <S%G3618>build<s%> My <S%G1577>church;<s%> and the <S%G4439>gates<s%> of <S%G86>Hades<s%> shall not <S%G2729>overpower<s%> it.

"I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> and <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you shall <S%G1210>bind<s%> on <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall be <S%G1210>bound<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you shall <S%G3089>loose<s%> on <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G2008>warned<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> that they should <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> that He was the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

From that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> that He <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> from the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and be <S%G615>killed,<s%> and be <S%G1453>raised<s%> up on the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> Him <S%G4355>aside<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2436>"God<s%> <S%G2436>forbid<s%> [it,] <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1510>happen<s%> to You."

But He <S%G4762>turned<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G5217>"Get<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> Me, <S%G4567>Satan!<s%> You are a <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>block<s%> to Me; for you are not <S%G5426>setting<s%> your <S%G5426>mind<s%> on God's interests, but man's."

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> Me, let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up his <S%G4716>cross,<s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> Me.

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it; but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G622>loses<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for My <S%G1752>sake<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> it.

"For <S%G5101>what<s%> will a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G5623>profited,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2770>gains<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2210>forfeits<s%> his <S%G5590>soul<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> will a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> in <S%G465>exchange<s%> for his <S%G5590>soul<s%>?

"For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of His <S%G3962>Father<s%> with His <S%G32>angels;<s%> and will <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G591>recompense<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G4234>deeds.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, there are <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> shall not <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in His <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>"
